attributes.review: This app is awful, It keeps crashing and won't stop. There's literally nothing to do on here. I downloaded it and it took all of my storage. I had to delete basically EVERYTHING on my phone. It took hours to download. This app is a solid 0/10.
attributes.title: AWFUL

attributes.review: probably the worst app I've ever come across. upon downloading this app a spirit came into my room and started to chase me around my house spitting at my family and throwing my dead grandmother ashes all over my nicholas cage shrine. he then presumed to eat my holy bread and left without closing the door. im in shock
attributes.title: horrid

attributes.review: This app is soooo bad it took me about 3 days just to download it. Also when it was downloading my phone kept glitching and the app made me stub my toe Everytime I opened the app in conclusion this is the worst app there is and I highly recommend that you do not Download it.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: The app was extremely laggy and all information loaded extremely slow. Took forever to download and hard to manage and figure out. If you wanna hear all about Trumps campaign and what he believes, I recommend looking at his Twitter.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: I first downloaded this app to catch up on politics. But when I got on the app I was greeted by a terrifying old man. He had an awful spray tan and dead baggy eyes. My children looked over my shoulder and saw him. They cried for hours. They still have nightmares weeks later. Even I got scared. Please fix this.
attributes.title: TERRIFYING!
